lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: I would like to help someone make a living for themselves.

lender.name: Mari
lender.occupational_info: I am in graduate school at Duke University, preparing to become a professor of sociology.

lender.name: Liane
lender.loan_because: I simply want to help others make this a better world.

lender.name: Mila
lender.loan_because: I was a small business owner back in my native country - Russia and understand the challenges a woman meets, particularly in developing countries, on the way from survivalship to become a successful entrepreneur. I know that what seems a small amount to me , can be a life changing opportunity for those who are less fortunate .
lender.occupational_info: As a professional I help people to make a right decision while buying or selling real estate. My personal moto is: "I shall pass through this world but once, any good that I can do, or any kindness that I can show any human being, let me do it now, and not defer it. For I shall not pass this way again." - Stephen Geller

lender.name: Barb
lender.loan_because: I want to reach out and help others improve their lives. Sharing our blessings to make a better world is a wonderful way to put Jesus' teaching to "love our neighbors" into practice.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a grant program that helps 35 elderly people in our area remain in their homes instead of having to go into a nursing facility. We can offer them help with their personal care such as bathing and dressing, as well as light housekeeping. It makes such a difference to each of these people, helping them stay independent.

lender.name: Jess
lender.loan_because: I understand the concept of budgeting and how a little really can go a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student working in the field of environmental biology.

lender.name: Avis
lender.loan_because: I appreciate the opportunity to help someone improve their life. Kiva provides an awesome opportunity to touch lives around the world. My dad had his own business and so I appreciate the challenges faced by the small business person. I can only imagine how much harder those challenges are in othr parts of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a large university and provide advice to students to help them select courses, majors and other academic opportunities on campus.

lender.name: craig
lender.loan_because: sometimes all you need is a little help to go so much further then where you are . I am just returning the favor to others
lender.occupational_info: research and development of thin film coating in vacum chambers' five years new to me '

lender.name: Teague
lender.loan_because: My family wants me to learn to have compassion and be globally conscious.
lender.occupational_info: Eat, sleep, play

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I contribute to Kiva loans to help build a world of compassion and peace. The Kiva system allows my dollars to stay in circulation thus multiplying the power of its contribution to a new world.
lender.occupational_info: My day job is that of a software engineer and I have written and assisted in writing programs that helps to identify people, or to help find lost things. I am also an artist. I call my art "spiritual abstractions", these are painting that strive to show us all that we are more then we appear to be.

lender.name: Ulf
lender.loan_because: I find the stories amazing and make me really understand how fortunate I am to be able to make a difference for someone who really needs and deserve it.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: Every person can make a difference

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I loan gifts in the name of Jesus Christ.
lender.occupational_info: I'm looking to graduate from college with a degree in special education.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity to achieve their dreams.

lender.name: Jackie
lender.loan_because: it is a way for me to connect with people around the world & help them with their businesses in a more personal manner. Additionally it is a way for me to share in what God has blessed me with in my life to others in need.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that makes baked goods - bread, rolls, cakes, pies, crackers, etc. and I help them to reduce their impact on the environment.

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: i like to contribute to other people's success, like people have contributed to mine :)
lender.occupational_info: helping people access, share, and create knowledge, information, and cultural objects

lender.name: michele
lender.loan_because:
Unless we practice loving feelings toward everyone we meet, day in, day out, we're missing out on the most joyous part of life. If we can actually open our hearts, there's no difficulty in being happy.
-Ayya Khema, "Be an Island"

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I want to help individuals who are trying to support their families.

lender.name: hayata
lender.loan_because: something I can do for helping.

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: KIVA rocks!!!

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I have more than most people in the world, and can give knowing my money is benefitting others that have less than I do.
lender.occupational_info: I care for the elderly.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Sophie
lender.loan_because: Sophie received a Kiva gift certificate for her 5th birthday. Sophie, 5 Y.O: "To be nice. So people can be happy."

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: "You can't lead anyone else further than you have gone yourself"
lender.occupational_info: I am a student

lender.name: Greg and Carrie
lender.loan_because: I care about the people in the developing world, and I want to see nations transformed by alleviating poverty with loans that jumpstart small business.
lender.occupational_info: Helping US companies sell more product online through online marketing.

lender.name: Arif I
lender.loan_because: I came from poverty and always have and will continue to preach smalll business as a way out of poverty. My father was bedridden when I was five and passed away when I was ten. I have utmost admiration for my Mum who raised 6 children with bare minimum, plucking things out of nature,with out a job or a small business.
lender.occupational_info: I am a small business owner and small business not only is a great way out of poverty and a means of success and independence. It is gratifying to see ones direct input and the resulting output. Anyone can have a job. It takes a real man or woman to take the intiative to start and run a business successfully.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: I love that this site enables my help to directly reach REAL PEOPLE and impact their lives directly. Fantastic idea.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It is for a worthy cause and is a great concept.
lender.occupational_info: I provide benefits for people that helps protect their income.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: I care about other people in the world.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: it's a helping hand.

lender.name: Alison
lender.occupational_info: I assist Australian Indigenous peoples achieve a University education.

lender.name: Galena Alyson Canada
lender.loan_because: Kiva manifests the potential of the internet in the very best way.
lender.occupational_info: American born, raised there and abroad, Lena makes her home in a rural Maya village in Central America, with working trips to the Pacific Northwest.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I have seen first hand the impact microfinance makes. I believe in the power of attempt...and this is exactly what these entrepreneurs are doing...attempting...
lender.occupational_info: I help people in developing countries and people recovering from disasters rebuild and start over in small steps.

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: I made a New Year's resolution to be a better citizen of the world. It's an honor to be able to provide a loan to someone who is working so hard to improve their life and the welfare of their community.
lender.occupational_info: I work to help people in my community have better access to public transportation. With better transit, the quality of their lives can improve.

lender.name: VANESSA
lender.loan_because: I hope that I can make a small difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Dave & Sarah
lender.loan_because: Every little helps...
lender.occupational_info: Dave works in an office and Sarah is a counsellor.

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: I'd like to start giving back, now that I'm starting to earn my own money. I have been so fortunate - growing up in the States, pursuing an engineering degree, being able to travel and study abroad. I believe strongly in the effectiveness of microfinance and the impact of no-interest loans for entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently studying Industrial Engineering. This major focuses on the big picture - people, processes, and systems - and how to make it more efficient and productive.

lender.name: April
lender.loan_because: I feel so blessed to be employed. This is such a simple way to share that feeling.
lender.occupational_info: I design buildings and see them through construction.

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: I believe in lifting as I climb.
lender.occupational_info: I support and manage federal grants.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do...
lender.occupational_info: I am an Air Traffic Controller (I keep airplanes from touching during flight), I get to do this is the best city in the world, Seattle WA and I have the best wife I could have asked for. Karma is amazing and I did something right to get this lucky!!

lender.name: L&L
lender.loan_because: Capital is the cure for poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Individual salvation, collective rejoicing.

lender.name: The Wrightees
lender.loan_because: A lot of people helped us out a little bit here and there, we know it works.

lender.name: CrankyMax
lender.loan_because: It gives people a start, the rest is up to them. It improves the community, rather than bypassing it.
lender.occupational_info: I organize information in computers

lender.name: ROCCO
lender.loan_because: I love helping others, I am strong believer in consumer economics, yet we humans, now more than ever, must be responsible in how our consumption is affecting the earth itself and all other life forms here, I have worked in many capacities in business, and now to become a lender in business is another experience for me to have.
lender.occupational_info: My work is routine and huge in paper-work. I would say to anyone who is doing business accross the world that one would be surprised of the similarities, yet take your largest risks in the things you love the most and just go with your gut instincts.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I teach college and write and do photography. I love it all.

lender.name: Yvonne
lender.loan_because: I think that it is better to help people in there own country than to give money to goverments

lender.name: Mauro
lender.loan_because: I believe that if the things goes better in the rest of the world it's good for me and my family too...
lender.occupational_info: Usually i work around website portal of my company

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: It costs nothing and make poverty a bit more far from people.
lender.occupational_info: Archiving and managing digital contents for an italian editorial group.

lender.name: Serge
lender.loan_because: I hope that micro lending enables people to work their way out of poverty for them, their family and community
lender.occupational_info: show the creative and operational people in the company I work for how the company / products are doing

lender.name: Paolo
lender.loan_because: Con il microcredito possiamo aiutare milioni di persone in tutto il mondo.

lender.name: cedric
lender.loan_because: I am really lucky to live in France and to earn enough money, and Kiva is a very elegant way to rebalance the inequalities between North and South.
lender.occupational_info: IT business development

lender.name: The Valdys
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of people working smart and hard to better themselves and I always believe in giving then you shall receive.
lender.occupational_info: I help organisation to create better computer software.

lender.name: RINALDI
lender.loan_because: I believe in mankind I believe in a better world
lender.occupational_info: borring lol

lender.name: ABDUL
lender.loan_because: i want to loan because i want to expand my business as i think i now have the potential to expand the business after doing it for some time now.
lender.occupational_info: in northern sierra leone,motor bike rental has been the main source of movement from one point to the other within a limited time and it would take you to the most remote side of the country side where a vehicle will never dream of going. so as such i purchase motor bikes and give it ton a rider who inturn will pay me at the end of the day,weeek or month depending on our agreement. this form of trade has created a huge employment for young people in not only my region, but other part of the country.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: thanks to Kiva, I no longer feel powerless to make a difference.

lender.name: Danny& Selena
lender.loan_because: It takes a village to raise a child.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the service industry. Iclean other buisness after they close for the day .All my work is done through the night hours.

lender.name: Deb E.
lender.loan_because: It was very easy progam to get involved with to help others. To be a small part in somthing that will have a much bigger impact on someone else. I recently took my children to see a movie. The cost for tickets, popcorn and a drink was almost $50! How many other people could have put that to better use?
lender.occupational_info: Parent first, we live on a small organic farm, We do not use herbicides or pesticides, which means more work but the benefits sure taste better and we are leaving our farm a better place for the future. We also keep 10 hives of honeybees and know they have a good place to work.

lender.name: Bill and Mary
lender.loan_because: I have a loving son who has inspired me with a gift to share. I want to invest this gift with the free spirit of individual enterprise.
lender.occupational_info: I have had the privilege of many career pursuits. Not by choice, mind you. I have served as a soldier, operated my own dairy farm, delivered mail as a postal carrier, repaired aircraft for a major airline, and now test the operation of large trucks or semi tractors.

lender.name: Giles
lender.loan_because: I give to charity, but think it is important that I should help individuals to build their own businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I am a barrister (a lawyer) in Bradford in Britain. I specialise in criminal law. I prosecute and defend. I am self employed.

lender.name: shahida
lender.loan_because: This is one way to have a direct link with people who are transforming their lives, the lives of their children and their community. I like knowing that the money is going to those who want to be more self sufficent. For me this is about PEACE. Peace in the heart and in the mind. Peace that comes from knowing that you can feed your children. Peace comes when your children can go to school. Peace when you are being productive in your life. Peace comes from autonomy and community. Peace comes when everyone in the home has food and in their bellies and can get a good nights' sleep. Peace comes when the home is happy and basic needs are met. Peace comes when one feels a growing sense of self respect, dignity and accomplishment. Peace comes from knowing that somewhere out in this big world of ours, there are people whom we will never meet, that care about the existence of others from the far flung corners of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a massage therapist and work with clients to relieve chronic pain and to bring peacefulness and healing to the world, one person at a time.

lender.name: Beth
lender.occupational_info: Artist, nature & cultural enthusiast.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: in helping another of God's children, I'm thanking God for the help he has given me.
lender.occupational_info: I take a tithe (10%) of my disability income to fund charitable causes as the Lord God directs me. Then 10-20% to purchase investments (stocks, bonds, etc) to help grow my income. The rest is used for living and medical expenses.

lender.name: Yvonne
lender.loan_because: Thirty years ago, Yvonne wrote and edtied Sunworld, the magazine of the Internatiional Solar Energy Society. Now she has Alzheimer's Disease, but she would have liked Kiva.

lender.name: Linet
lender.loan_because: I want to help erradicate poverty. I have thought about it for some time now and could not come up with an efficient way of doing it. Kiva seems to be the answer :-)
lender.occupational_info: I analyze and interpret a huge amount of data. My findings are used in the implementation of business goals

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: It's simple: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I provide private tutoring and childcare to young children.

lender.name: mark
lender.loan_because: I have visited many third world countries and have seen people with little being so generous of spirt.

lender.name: charlie
lender.loan_because: Helping people is a great reward in life.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired and focus my time helping my children become better people.

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Kira
lender.loan_because: A lot can be accomplished a little at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I teach mathematics to college students.

lender.name: Chandrasekhar
lender.loan_because: It is the least I can do. I appreciate all that I have been blessed with.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers, making them useful in wading through the all the information that overwhelms us.

lender.name: Michael Frazier
lender.loan_because: It gives me the opportunity to assist others to reach their entrepreneurial goals.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies and people reach their employment goals.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: It's such an easy way to make a big impact on someone elses life. Pay it forward!

lender.name: Boris
lender.loan_because: In a few hours an American earns as much as a family in another country in a week! Giving them an opportunity to do better is a good thing. It is by small steps from everyone that the world can improve.
lender.occupational_info: I tutor mathematics to struggling students. I'm a member of Giving What We Can: I give 10% of my earnings to the most effective charities (VillageReach & Deworm The World; see GiveWell.org). I plan to give 50% of my income when I start earning more.

lender.name: Wings
lender.loan_because: I believe that one person CAN make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work diligently to 'make a difference' for my employer's varied entities in every possible way.

lender.name: Phoebe & Chloe
lender.loan_because: It can make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: We are in 7th and 5th grade.

lender.name: Pat + Ted
lender.loan_because: We know how important it is to have some capital to build a business, and hope many people can succeed in building their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: We work/worked for a factory that made safety boots - boots that protect your feet from heavy objects falling on them, or nails from piercing the soles.

lender.name: Kathey & Dale Austin
lender.loan_because: I like seeing how others use the money to help themselves!

lender.name: Glenn
lender.loan_because: It just works.

lender.name: Omar
lender.loan_because: I wanted to support entrepreneurs in poor countries to become self sufficient.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I had the opportunity to see first hand how microfinance loans while working in Ghana. I believe the loans give people opportunities they may not have had before. I believe Kiva brings it one more step further by connecting people to people.
lender.occupational_info: Early Literacy program

lender.name: Dan & Nancy
lender.loan_because: What a fantastic enterprise! It is very fulfilling to know that you are helping someone in need in a meaningful way. By periodically adding more money, as well as reinvesting previous funds, my contribution continually expands.

lender.name: David & Megan
lender.loan_because: It works!
lender.occupational_info: Orphan Care

lender.name: Micayla
lender.loan_because: I want to pay my good fortune forward.

lender.name: Damian
lender.loan_because: I believe in providing people the opportunity to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: Planning large information technology projects

lender.name: Giuseppe
lender.loan_because: I leaved for 18 years in west Africa and I have directly seen how life is there ...
lender.occupational_info: Top clients customer service supervisor in automotive industry

lender.name: Anne & Nathan
lender.loan_because: I believe I have to be the change I want to see in the world!!!
lender.occupational_info: Touching hearts and minds

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I was moved inside when I learned about Kiva on a recent PBS program. What a great idea by the Kiva founders! Loaning money is the easy part.
lender.occupational_info: I am an applications engineer for a semiconductor manufacturer. Lots of high tech stuff in my life. Kiva is a high tech solution to many low tech problems. I believe it is highly effective.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I want to empower other women to have financial control over their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to buy and sell homes.

lender.name: Jacqueline Lapham
lender.loan_because: People sometimes need a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired Postmaster with two grown children and three grandchildren.

lender.name: mike & jess
lender.loan_because: Our family decided to donate to others rather than exchange Christmas gifts this year. Glad I found Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: We work with adults with developmental disabilities who live within our community.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: by doing so I can help someone find strength and dignity and that they in turn will make their community a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I raise money for the University of St. Michael's College in Toronto, Ontario, Canada.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference, person by person. Thanks, Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: I teach art and photography to high school students.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: As an entrepreneur myself I understand how challenging it can be to get started. I've been fortunate to have help along the way and like to pass my good fortune on.
lender.occupational_info: I am a business consultant and help businesses in Canada grow and improve their businesses.

lender.name: Lily
lender.loan_because: My grandmother gave me this gift to teach me how to help individuals change the world bit by bit.

lender.name: Krista
lender.loan_because: I think everyone can make a difference -- no matter how big or how small.

lender.name: carla
lender.loan_because: It feels great to help people. If you keep re-loaning the money, it magnifies your ability to help.

lender.name: Adewole
lender.loan_because: I need loan so purchase locally fabricated machines, which the youth in my community can use in the recycling of waste and the project will be tagged waste to wealth for the youth in my community
lender.occupational_info: Youth and women will go out there to collect waste polythene and recycle them since polythene is a non degederable waste

lender.name: Merideth
lender.loan_because: I love to help thoes in need!

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I want to be a helping hand
lender.occupational_info: I used to work with birds, in publishing books and building museums

lender.name: Eberle
lender.loan_because: ...I can make a small difference in a stranger's life.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: People have helped me in big ways by loaning me money, so I'd like to give a little bit back by lending to others.
lender.occupational_info: I own a small computer software company.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: I study the intersection of society and technology, specifically technology use in crisis and disaster situations.

lender.name: Judy
lender.occupational_info: I work with young children who are having difficulty learning to read.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: Would love to do more for the less privileged but determined people across the world as I have experienced both sides.
lender.occupational_info: I help solve everyday problems.

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: I can therefore I should

lender.name: Russell
lender.loan_because: Every little helps!
lender.occupational_info: I prepare art before it goes to print

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: To assist and affect countries positively is a wonderful opportunity and a great dream for me professionally. A dream that helps me come to a realization and open my sights to the sensitive world in which we live. There is so much need on various levels. Being apart of this movement (KIVA), both economically and culturally is an invaluable experience that I will further utilize in my own business practices.
lender.occupational_info: Challenging, continuously learning, building and exciting.

lender.name: Cammy and Grandpa
lender.loan_because: Grandpa and I think it is a very good idea.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I feel that it is important to payforward the gifts received in this world. My life has been blessed with health, family and friends and I want to share those blessings with those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am an assistant to an attorney in a law firm that specializes in creditors rights and real estate

lender.name: Christie
lender.loan_because: Our family donated to charities instead of buying Christmas presents this year. Our daughter gave me a Kiva gift certificate.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: This Loan was a gift from a friend... what a great idea, Thank you Kathy

lender.name: Laura&Sean
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: Wer are both public school teachers.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: the butterfly effect of what we provide can have an enormous effect on others
lender.occupational_info: advise individuals how to better forecast, manage and invest for their future.

lender.name: Ana Paula Afonso
lender.loan_because: This microcredit could make a difference in a life.
lender.occupational_info: My work is highly captivating and rewarding... I give a lot of me, but what I have been receiving I cant buy in any place.

lender.name: Dorinne
lender.loan_because: I understand the importance of supporting your family with your own work.
lender.occupational_info: I teach private music lessons.

lender.name: Carlos
lender.loan_because: It can make a change...

lender.name: Dustin
lender.loan_because: It is my conviction that it is immoral to house surplus in a world with needs
lender.occupational_info: I just go to school and learn

lender.name: Stormie
lender.loan_because: I know the difference it can make. Sometimes all it takes to succeed is having someone put their faith in you.
lender.occupational_info: I write speeches and assemble presentations for a national trade association.

lender.name: Fred
lender.loan_because: If I don't strive to make a positive difference in the world ... how can I expect anyone else to do it?
lender.occupational_info: I develop technical training, produce videos, and write (books, screenplays, stage plays, documentaries, etc.)

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to directly benefit those in great need. 25.00 Dollars is so little, yet with a small handful of people donating that much it can go a long long way in a developing country.
lender.occupational_info: I believe in an interdependent universe where one individual's action has an effect on countless others. With so much negativity in our world today it's extremely important for each of us to try a little harder to positively affect those around us. All living beings desire happiness and want to avoid suffering.

lender.name: meg
lender.loan_because: We donate money because we care about people everywhere. And we know we can make a difference

lender.name: Allyson
lender.loan_because: I want to help make an economically just world for others.
lender.occupational_info: I help sick and poor people get things that they need, such as food or a place to live. When they are sad I listen to them to help them feel that someone cares about them.

lender.name: Lonnie & Glory
lender.loan_because: because we can
lender.occupational_info: we tell people about LegalShield Services.

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Pedro & Ana & Guilherme
lender.occupational_info: Mechanical Engineer And Chemist

lender.name: Baron
lender.loan_because: I have resources to share. God made us so we could love each other, and for me, that means sharing what I have.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Presbyterian minister. I serve a church where I preach and teach and try to care for its members and for as much of the world as we can.

lender.name: Ken & Irene
lender.loan_because: We like to help people.
lender.occupational_info: Ken is a scientist. Irene is a writer. She writes training books.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: It feels good!
lender.occupational_info: I manage large computing databases for an aircraft manufacturer but have a passion for old cars, motorcycles and photography, Mt Rainier is a favorite to shoot.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: I can, and I'm lucky for that opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers

lender.name: gabriel
lender.loan_because: I think its good that i can do my part in this world and help others in need
lender.occupational_info: I am a fulltime student

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: having walked through Nepal last fall, I realized how little it takes to help a lot!
lender.occupational_info: I help people who are too busy to do everything themselves

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: great company to help change lives
lender.occupational_info: helping people save money

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: It's fairly complicated, but it comes down to my Lord, Jesus Christ.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a high school English teacher. We read novels, learn how to write essays and discuss meaning.

lender.name: Tanner
lender.loan_because: I like helping people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in 4th grade.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to give everyone the opportunity to live a life that they have reason to value. I also believe that I am called to serve and this is a great way to do it.
lender.occupational_info: I read for hours every week about human rights, US history, policy, and much more. I also tutor students once a week.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I believe in people helping each other, and themselves. I want to put people in a position to improve their lives through their own hard work, with a little help from a far away friend.
lender.occupational_info: I make computers talk to each other and help people use them.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: it is the very least I can do.
lender.occupational_info: Depends on the day.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: I want to help. It is silly to have money sitting in a bank earning interest that the government taxes so it can fight wars, when it could help people live.

lender.name: The Wilhite family
lender.loan_because: it feels good to give to others who need help. It's a wonderful opportunity to teach our children how to treat and respect others.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: From each according to their ability to each according to their need is best done voluntarily.
lender.occupational_info: I build, remodel, and repair homes in a manner that has as small an impact on our environment as possible.

lender.name: kathleen
lender.loan_because: How fortunate I was to be born in the USA. Microlending is an innovative way to help me stay personally and intimately aware of my less fortunate sisters and brothers in need and make the world a smaller place.
lender.occupational_info: I am a real estate lawyer in a small Texas town. My passion is world travel. One day soon I want to volunteer my time and talents to charitable work in a developing country.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I believe it will help give a person a chance to improve things for themselves, for their family, and for their community.
lender.occupational_info: I do research to better understand why armed conflict happens around the world.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I want to do something that helps someone, somewhere, no matter how small that help is.
lender.occupational_info: I am the founder of ActivityLounge.com, a social network that me and my team built for outdoor and extreme sports enthusiasts around the world. Check it out if you want!

lender.name: Clare and John
lender.loan_because: it helps people to help themselves, and their community
lender.occupational_info: I run a factory which makes chemicals just outside Los Angeles.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I have an awesome son who give me this gift for Christmas!

lender.name: Saiyid & Farah
lender.loan_because: Its a great satsfaction to help people in need.
lender.occupational_info: I work to support computer networks.

lender.name: Leonard
lender.loan_because: I received a gift certificate. I believe capitalism works.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe that there is no better use of my life than to spend it reaching out, assisting, and loving other people. Jesus taught me that :)
lender.occupational_info: I am learning to fly airplanes!

lender.name: Jeff.B
lender.loan_because: I want to help those looking to better their lives by being an entrepreneur. KIVA has a terrific concept that I am completely sold on and I look forward to supporting them in any way that I can.

lender.name: Wedding Guests
lender.loan_because: Jesus says what I do to the least of our brothers and sisters I do unto Him.

lender.name: Traci
lender.loan_because: I feel this is such a great connection...seeing where my money is going firsthand, and being able to help others, it's a great feeling!
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher of nine and ten year olds. I also teach singing and choir to 100 children.

lender.name: bernhard
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference

lender.name: ann
lender.loan_because: My 14 year old grandson made this selection. I hope this will demonstrate to him that one person can make a difference.

lender.name: Blair
lender.occupational_info: Teacher - English as a Second Language and Computer Skills

lender.name: Kay & Dick
lender.loan_because: It's time to give something back.
lender.occupational_info: Kay is a teacher in special ed. Dick is a trader.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: People with determination and initiative, who are willing to work to improve their lives deserve a loan.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I can and should.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I think it is the most respectful way to be helped. With microcredit people can get illusion for their projects. I like to feel I'm a little part of this.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: Because I can and feel it is important to help when I am able soall can fulfill thier potential

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I believe that by helping others we are also helping ourselves.
lender.occupational_info: I worked in the residential home building industry in administration for many years, but due to the current downturn in the US housing sector I am currently unemployed and enjoying my time off.

lender.name: BLA
lender.loan_because: Invest in Businesses to improve the individual, their family, and their community Ultimately this is to stimulate everyone's economy.
lender.occupational_info: I am a business person who has been blessed to be able to travel to several countries worldwide. I have also been blessed to have lived in other countries.

lender.name: Gerald
lender.loan_because: The "Haves" have a responsibility to help the "Have Nots" so they may turn around and help other people in the future with their successes. This idea of Kiva also has the possibility to end wars. One day at a time...
lender.occupational_info: Things have changed in our economy and so have I, I now work for an (ATM) repair business. Automatic money dispensing machines. It's something that people here in the U.S. value. It is very interesting work where you have the opportunity to work on computers, printers and currency dispensers all at the same time.

lender.name: stephen and annie
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping those who want to help themselves and being kind to one another
lender.occupational_info: custom furniture maker

lender.name: John & Sami
lender.loan_because: we have been so fortunate and we want to give something back.
lender.occupational_info: John is a retired 6th grade English teacher. Sami tis a retired nursing instructor.

lender.name: LIMO
lender.loan_because: We love to help.
lender.occupational_info: We just compare all the limo service rentals, get prices, limo picturess, stretch limos, hummers, sedans, limos, rentals, limousines, prices, quotes, deals, rates for everyone that needed a cheap limo.

lender.name: Glenn
lender.loan_because: What a joy to provide resources all over the world, a little bit at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I help customers make computers and software work together. Oh, and occasional acting :o).

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.occupational_info: I am a student studying math and international relations.

lender.name: liz
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves. Incrimental contributions can make a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: I manage software development projects for Wells Fargo Bank.

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: i want to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Bethany
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference!! I would have never made it to where I am today without the ability to take out loans for my education. I am lucky enough to live in the US where we have the chance to borrow money in order to make our dreams come true. I believe deserving individuals around the world should be awarded this same opportunity.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: It feels good to know I am helping someone. My small offering makes a big impact there.

lender.name: Gobeil Barnabe Families
lender.loan_because: I was really lucky to be born in a wealthy country. It's time to take some personal responsibility and take a risk. Have faith in someone much much less fortunate than me. Be empathetic. If I were in a bad situation, I sure would appreciate someone taking the time to help me out.

lender.name: Vinco
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info:
Manufacturing Industry.
Aluminium foundry and Toolmaking

lender.name: Rose
lender.loan_because: Making things better starts with me.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer, social activist and computer expert. My day-to-day work is with an organization which seeks to end the death penalty in the USA

lender.name: william
lender.loan_because: too often people who need money the most are not able to get it because of institutional obstacles. I believe that the men and women benefiting from these loans are hard-workers that want to build a better life for themselves and their families; this is inspiring to me.
lender.occupational_info: I am a political science graduate student preparing to become a professor at a college or university in order to contribute to research in the discipline as well as teach this most interesting and vital field.

lender.name: UST MicroCredit Program
lender.occupational_info: The Center for International Studies Micro-Credit Program is dedicated to assisting micro entrepreneurs living below the poverty threshold to start income generating businesses. The Program seeks to promote freedom, fairness, and democracy around the world by endorsing basic principles of micro-entrepreneurship, self-employment, property rights, and wealth accumulation, while integrating the Catholic values of the University of St. Thomas.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I believe the world will become a better place if we all give a little and have people picking themselves up to live a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student learning about history of the world and hope to start my own business some day.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: My wish is to empower women who have a desire to operate their own business especially those striving to reduce the impact of human population extremes.
lender.occupational_info: Prior to retirement I managed facilities for the military which engaged in the repair, testing and modification of electronic equipment. Teaching Electronics and Logistics to soldiers .

lender.name: paul
lender.loan_because: it is my privilege to be is a position to do so.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I too want to own a business and make it a success. Until then, I will live the dream through someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the development of online education products.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: others deserve the chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: help other engineers do their job better through education.

lender.name: Jenna
lender.loan_because: I am a Christian, and I want to live like Jesus did -- loving others with my words and my actions.
lender.occupational_info: I teach at a bilingual preschool in Minneapolis.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: I want to support small entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I help bloggers make money from advertising.

lender.name: Patti
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people.
lender.occupational_info: I like to sew quilts, do genealogy and spend time with my grandchildren. I like to volunteer and help the elderly.

lender.name: Lo Family
lender.loan_because: it's like saving the world without leaving home!
lender.occupational_info: Husband - retired university lecturer Wife - ESL teacher Daughter - University student

lender.name: BatchBlue Software
lender.loan_because: Sponsoring entrepreneurs through kiva.org is a perfect fit with our company's mission of helping people own and operate their own businesses.
lender.occupational_info: We're a start-up software company specializing on the needs of small business owners and entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Jason and Marcia
lender.loan_because: We've been blessed so abundantly in the Lord Jesus and we want to follow Him in serving those in need.

lender.name: Theresa
lender.loan_because: it's a nice reminder that we are all connected.

lender.name: Jacob & Kelly
lender.loan_because: We can.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: We can bring opportunities to areas that have been historically denied them

lender.name: Cornell College Dems
lender.occupation: College Students in Mount Vernon, Iowa
lender.loan_because: As Democrats we want to help alleviate poverty and encourage economic independence!

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in other countries and the Kiva plan seems like a good way to make a modest amount of money do a lot of good.
lender.occupational_info: I drive a Ford van taking people in wheelchairs to their medical appointments. I also work part-time helping people with their income tax returns. In the United States this is very complicated.

lender.name: Carlos
lender.loan_because: I believe every single action has a reaction, good actions will have good reactions, and because i believe we all have something to give.
lender.occupational_info: I am college student in Foreign Affairs here in Mxico, one day i will become a politician and multiply my help and givings.

lender.name: amy
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: i dance with more feeling than you can imagine.

lender.name: Rosalind
lender.loan_because: I would like to see women improve the stability and quality of life for themselves and their children.
lender.occupational_info: I am now retired, after working in medical and education areas

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: I love the concept.

lender.name: peggy
lender.loan_because: i have been blessed with the opportunity to pursue my dream and would like to try and pass that along
lender.occupational_info: i create playful colored ink and watercolor drawings and reflective photography of often overlooked details which i sell at art shows around the west/midwestern united states

lender.name: Vince
lender.loan_because: the Kiva process makes it easy to make a positive impact on the lives of people in need. I like that you get to know a little about the people you are helping and I enjoy the satisfaction of taking part to improve the lives of others across the globe.
